about.title: Satellite Based Disaster Early Warning System
about.subtitle: Real-time satellite alerts, interactive maps, and actionable insights to help communities prepare, respond, and stay safe before disasters strike.
about.satelliteMonitoringDesc: Continuous ingestion of multi-spectral satellite imagery to detect environmental changes and hazards.
about.realTimeAlertsDesc: Automatic alert generation with severity levels and tailored notifications for affected regions.
about.interactiveMapsDesc: Visualize warnings, impacted zones, and live overlays on an easy-to-use map interface.
about.analyticsInsightsDesc: Time-series analysis and trends to help anticipate risk and plan resource allocation.
about.multilingualSupportDesc: Accessible interface with language switching to reach a broader audience.
about.secureReliableDesc: Built with secure APIs and robust processing pipelines for dependable delivery.
about.dataCollection: Data collection — continuous satellite imagery and sensor feeds are ingested into the platform.
about.processingDetection: Processing & detection — automated algorithms and ML models analyze the data to identify potential hazards and anomalies.
about.alertGeneration: Alert generation — when thresholds are exceeded, the system composes alerts with severity, location, and recommended actions.
about.visualizationDistribution: Visualization & distribution — alerts appear on interactive maps, dashboards, and are distributed via notifications and APIs.
about.dataProcessing: Data Processing: Python, GDAL, ML pipelines
about.storageHosting: Storage & Hosting: Cloud object storage, scalable compute
about.dataSourcesDesc: We combine public satellite imagery, meteorological feeds, and government advisories to deliver accurate and timely warnings. The modular pipeline makes it easy to add additional feeds and integrate local data sources.
about.protectCommunitiesDesc: By providing early, reliable warnings and clear guidance, the platform empowers authorities and citizens to act quickly and reduce disaster impact.
about.questions: Questions or want to contribute? Contact us at hello@disasterwatch.example
